name: WKWebpagePreferences
desc: An object that specifies the behaviors to use when loading and rendering page content.

items.name: var allowsContentJavaScript: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether JavaScript from web content is allowed to run.

items.name: var preferredContentMode: WKWebpagePreferences.ContentMode
items.desc: The content mode for the web view to use when it loads and renders a webpage.

items.name: enum WKWebpagePreferences.ContentMode
items.desc: Constants that indicate how to render web view content.
